paragraph_1: As a self-taught Developer, I transitioned into this field through a professional career change, turning my passion for technology into my profession. Teaching myself to code has honed my ability to learn independently and adapt quickly to new tools and concepts.
paragraph_2: Over the past year, I’ve focused on web development, gaining solid expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies through the completion of several hands-on projects. This experience has strengthened my ability to design and deliver solutions tailored to user needs.
paragraph_3: I’m driven by a constant desire to learn, tackle new technical challenges, and contribute actively to innovative projects.
